amendment.description: To provide that funds made available for the Air Force for military construction for the Satellite Processing Operations Support Facility at Cape Canaveral Air Station, Florida, shall be made available instead for the Satellite Alert Facility at Cape Canaveral Air Station, Florida.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3711 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3711 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S3786; text: CR S3786) To provide that funds made available for the Air Force for military construction for the Satellite Processing Operations Support Facility at Cape Canaveral Air Station, Florida, shall be made available instead for the Satellite Alert Facility at Cape Canaveral Air Station, Florida.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3711 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3711 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Nelson FL.
